text: 266px ' (February 20, 1586 - March 29, 1620) was a Japanese daimyō of the Edo period, who ruled the Tokushima Domain. His court title was Awa no kami. He married Manhime (1592–1666), daughter of Ogasawara Hidemasa Yoshishige fought during the Siege of Osaka at the Battle of Kizugawa. ==Family== * Father: Hachisuka Iemasa * Mother: Jiko-in (1563-1606) * Wife: Manhime (1592–1666) * Children: ** Hachisuka Tadateru by Manhime ** Mihohime (1603-1632) married Ikeda Tadakatsu by Manhime ** Shotokuin (1614-1683) married Mizuno Narisada by Manhime Category:1586 births Category:1620 deaths Category:Daimyo Category:Hachisuka clan
title: Hachisuka Yoshishige
